name: Chicken With Tomatoes, Capers and Olives
description: With a little practice and a little added flavor, a humble chicken breast can be anything you want.
keywords: chicken, olives, tomato, low-fat, main course

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 425. Combine 2 or 3 chopped tomatoes, the juice of .5 lemon, 1 teaspoon capers and a handful of olives.
Lightly grease the pan with olive oil, then put the chicken in the pan and pour the tomato mixture over it.
Roast for 10 to 15 minutes, or until just cooked through.
